[DQC.US.0094.9527] The element us-gaap:LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOfFiscalYear with a value of 61,404,000 is used in the filing as is the element us-gaap:LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo with a value of 80,216,000. However no value is provided for the element LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwelveMonths. If there is no value for year one but there is a value for the remainder of the year and there is a value for year two, then year one should either have a value of 0, or Year one should have the value for Year 2 of 80,216,000.
Period :2023-05-31 Unit : USD Dimensions: Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9527 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1170010/000117001023000065/kmx-20230531.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0094.9527] The element us-gaap:FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOfFiscalYear with a value of 32,489,000 is used in the filing as is the element us-gaap:FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo with a value of 41,312,000. However no value is provided for the element FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwelveMonths. If there is no value for year one but there is a value for the remainder of the year and there is a value for year two, then year one should either have a value of 0, or Year one should have the value for Year 2 of 41,312,000.
